activities: We are a policy processing system which recevies and processes insured information.
recoursemech:
1. for disputes involving all personal information received by Maximum Processing, Inc. from Switzerland, Maximum Processing, Inc. has agreed and to cooperate with the Swiss FDPIC;
2. for disputes involving employment-related personal information received by Maximum Processing, Inc. from the EEA, Maximum Processing, Inc. has agreed to cooperate with the data protection authorities in the EEA and to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities;
